mapper.select: SELECT bi.`day`, bi.pay_btc, pb.pay_at, pb.txid, bi.wallet_address FROM user_pay_bill pb LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill_item bi ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE pb.`status` = 0 AND bi.puid = #{payItem.puid}
SELECT pb.txid, pb.pay_at, bi.pay_btc FROM user_pay_bill pb LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill_item bi ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE pb.`status` = 0 AND bi.puid = #{puid}
SELECT SUM(bi.pay_btc) FROM user_pay_bill_item bi LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill pb ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE (pb.`status` = 1 or pb.`status` is null) AND bi.puid = #{puid}

SELECT bi.puid, SUM(bi.pay_btc) AS pay_btc FROM user_pay_bill_item bi LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill pb ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE (pb.`status` = 1 or pb.`status` is null) AND bi.puid IN #{item}
GROUP BY bi.puid
SELECT bi.* FROM user_pay_bill_item bi LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill pb ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE bi.puid = #{userId} AND TO_DAYS(pb.pay_at) = TO_DAYS(#{yesterday})

SELECT bi.puid, SUM(bi.pay_btc) AS pay_btc FROM user_pay_bill_item bi LEFT JOIN user_pay_bill pb ON pb.bill_number = bi.bill_number WHERE bi.puid in #{item} AND TO_DAYS(pb.pay_at) = TO_DAYS(#{yesterday}) GROUP BY puid
